name: Print for Figma
description:
Create Print Documents in Figma 🖨️ 📄 📝

‎Easily setup frames that are sized properly for printing at specific DPIs.


NEW (June 2021)

Celebrating 6000+ Installs!

-> Major Interface Update

-> Crop Marks!

  • You can now add crop marks to documents that have bleed enabled.

-> Branding Update (hello, cmyk!)


Document Presets

  • 📄 NA: Letter (8.5x11), Half Letter, Legal, Ledger, Govt. Letter, Card, Postcard, Poster
  • 📃 INTERNATIONAL: A3, A4, A5, A6
  • 📐 Custom Size!


Supported DPIs

  • 72 (default), 150, 300


⭐ How it Works ⭐

  1. Choose a preset or enter custom dimensions.
  2. Customize your document options (pages, DPI, bleed, & crop marks).
  3. Press the big blue button.
  4. Profit!


Coming Soon

  • Margins / Trim Area
  • CMYK Proofing
  • Exporting


Contact ben@ktz.dev or leave a comment for suggestions 😀
